testcase.name: User can create cluster with name "QA-cluster"
User can not create cluster with name "QA-cluster" that already exists
testcase.system-out:
Steps: Given cluster data ... passed When User create cluster ... passed Then Response is "400" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters data = { "cluster": { "node_templates": {" jt_nn.medium": 1, "tt_dn.small": 1 }, "name": "QA-cluster", "base_image_id": "d9342ba8-4c51-441c-8d5b-f9e14a901299" } } response = 400
400 == 400

testcase.name: User can delete cluster with name "QA-cluster" by ID
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User delete cluster with id: "0" ... passed Then Response is "204" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters/dae9658fba4246a5a6cc50e09d9184d8 response = 204
204 == 204

testcase.name: User can not create cluster with blank cluster name
User can not create cluster with invalid characters in cluster name
User can not create cluster with space in cluster name
User can not create cluster with blank base image ID
User can not create cluster with wrong base image ID #This cluster create #No validation
testcase.system-out: Steps:

testcase.name: User can not create cluster with negative parameter in number of JT and NN
User can not create cluster with negative parameter in number of TT and DN
User can not create cluster with characters in number of JT and NN
User can not create cluster with characters in number of TT and DN
User can not create cluster with nonexistent JT and NN
User can not create cluster with nonexistent TT and DN
User can not create cluster with empty value for JT and NN
User can not create cluster with empty value for TT and DN
testcase.system-out:
Steps: Given cluster data ... passed When User create cluster ... passed Then Response is "400" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters data = { "cluster": { "node_templates": { "jt_nn.medium": 1, "": 1 }, "name": "QA-cluster-10", "base_image_id": "d9342ba8-4c51-441c-8d5b-f9e14a901299" } } response = 400
400 == 400

testcase.name: User can not create cluster without number of JT and NN
User can not create cluster without number of TT and DN
User can not create cluster without JT and NN
User can not create cluster without (JT, NN) and (TT, DN)
